fields.descriptive_line: Drawing issued for construction showing long sections EE and FF for Chris Lowe loft apartment, designed by Brookes Stacey Randall, 1994.
fields.physical_description: Drawing issued for construction showing long sections EE and FF.
fields.materials_techniques: Hand drawn black technical pen on tracing vellum with annotations on sticky backed acetate.
fields.location: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level D, case ROLL BELOW LL CUPBOARD
fields.marks:
'275-0-13'
 'ALAN BROOKES ASSOCIATES / ARCHITECTS + TECHNOLOGY CONSULTANTS / APARTMENT ONE 1-10 SUMNERS STREET LONDON EC1 / G.A. SECTION   Long section EE&FF   29/07/94 / DWG. NO.275-0-13 / 1:20'
 'ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION / LL DIMENSIONS, RADII AND OFFSETS / FOR SETTING OUT SHOWN ON DRAWINGS / TO BE CHECKED ON SITE BY CONTRACTOR / TEMPLATES TO BE MADE OF CURVED /  WALLS
 'SECTION EE'
'EXISTING GLAZING / Exisiting made good and finished as / necessary'
'Existing wall surface'
'Recessed existing wall plane finished with / Dulux 4502-V'
'Existing roof structure'
'2 layers 12.5mm plasterboard fixed on / curve to underside of existing roof / structure'
' New wall face formaed from two layers / 12.5mm plasterboard onto 50mm fully / boxed studs at 450mm centres with / noggins as necessary'
'GLASS STAIRCASE' / 19mm acid etched glass treads and risers with mitred edge fixed / to 2no. 20mm diameter stainless steel rods with cast steel fixings. / 20mm diam   stainless steel handrail.'
'Structural opening for rooflight to / existing roof to be fully prepared to / allow for instalation of prefabricated / rooflight element. / Long walls to main spaces to have 60mm / shadow recess skirting under all elements / and screens. Bathroom wall to have / 60mm shadow line over bathroom / kitchen and storage pod screens.'
'8mm SS support tie to mezzanine with / circular recessed connection at ceiling. / Adjustment within mezzanine at base'
'Sealed, toughened and curved double / glazed rooflight using frameless glazing / by Schuco with internal extruded / aluminium pivoting Sunshield 165 louvres / by technical blinds finished in white / polyester powder coating BS 00A 01. / Rooflight opens on 2no. hydraulic rams at / sides, operated by infra-red sensor with / seperate electrical switch as override. / External wind and rain sensors to close / rooflight automatically in certain / conditions. Louvres interconnected on / curved racking arm to open and close / together. Louvres operated by infra-red / sensor with electrical switch as override'
'Bisque 96mm diameter gilled tube radiator / galvinised and polyester powder coated / to White BS 00A 01. Flow nad return / rise in recessed wall trunking and pass / through mezzanine support CHS / connecting onto 15mm diam pipes pre- / fitted into void created in mezzanine / structure'
'LIGHT ING TO US. OF MEZZANINE / 100m thick whote birch mezzanine, with / vertical 100 x 20 stainless steel insert / plates to form composite structure / spanning from 200 x 100 RHS fixed onto / existing 'I' section columns within wall, to 8mm diam stainless steel rods / 3680'
'8mm STAINLESS STEEL SUPPORT TIE'
'40mm stainless steel handrail spaning / between wall and roof steel'
'Flush access panel in wall to conceal 6 no. / 13 amp power sockets, 1 no. telephone / socket and 1 no. TV socket'
' Shelf formed from two folded 3mm / stainless steel sheets with two rows of / 20mm diam x 35mm stainless steel / spacer lugs at equal centres wielded to / underside of top sheet and tapped to / receive stainless steel m6
 socket head / machine screws. Shelf spans between / wall and 50 x 25mm oval stainless steel / support leg conduit. Void between plates / of shelf to receive slimline transformers. / Cables to 12v lights on underside of / mezzanine pass down oval support leg and / through 18 x 20mm void created in / mezzanine structure'
'Ceiling finish White Dulux 0500-N'
'120mm Shadow Recess finished in Grey / Dulux 4502-Y.'
'Wall finish White Dulux 0500-N'
'MANUAL OVERRIDE / TO SOLENOID'
'DIRECTION OF TRAVEL'
'FD 30 Fire door made from 3 layers / 10mm fire resistant MDF laminated using / inert glue and curved with integral smoke / seal and intumescent strip by Sealmaster. / Door rotates on floor pivot with integral / self closing mechanism held open with / solonoid catches linked to fire alarm / system to release door to closed position / in the event of  fire. Door finish white.'
'Natural anodised perforatd sliding / aluminium screen. Tp hung at rear into recessed channel flush with curved wall / face at head, with restraint fixed to wall / at base over which screen slides.'
'ENTRANCE DOOR'
'19mm laquered adjustable MDF shelves / to internal sides of cupboards supported / on Hafele nickel plate shelf supports with / sleeve. Cat no. 282.01.701'
'EXISTING PARTY WALL'
'Edge etching float glass downlighter by / Concord lighting Ref. 16252 with / emergency backup. Light operation to be / switched to formt door opening with / overrride switch on main switch panel. / Alarm panel recessed into wall behind / hinged stainless steel cover plate with / rectangular slot cut into face to expose / LED display. / Main lighting switch plate in stainless / steel using Wasndsworth Electrical toggle / switches within single stainless steel / backing plate. Each light switch to be / labelled with etched letters below. / Video entry screen recessed into wall / with screen set into stainless steel / surround and speaker concealed behind / circular perforated stainless steel disc. / All controls to be stainless steel push / buttons. / False floor within cupboard 120mm above / FFL of main space, capable of bearing full / floor load.
 'SECTION F F'
'Acid etched Pyrostop glazing rated to 30 / minutes'
'Potterton Lynx 2 23.5kw combination / natural gas boiler fixed at a high level / within cupboard'
'Wall to door surround to be reinforced / using security mesh fixed to attack face / of wall covered by 12.5mm plasterboard. / Internal face to be formed using 12.5mm / plywood faced with 12.5mm plasterboard'
'Letterbox'
'750   50  250'
'19mm Solid MDF door with white Dulux / 0500-N smooth laquered finish and / concealed edge handle'
'Frameless acid etched side hung opening / door. Stainless steel hinge plate bonded to / edge of glazing. Hinge plates to match / pivot plates on other adjacent screens. / Door closes against matching door stop / catches.'
'Acid etched pivoting glass assemblies on / stainless steel frame to rear'
'3395'
'6 No Pixel framing projector light flush / fitting with plasterboard skin to ceiling. / (cat No 8075)'
'3390'
'Long wall to main space to have 60mm / shadow recess skirting under all elements / and screens. Bathroom wall to have / 60mm shadow line over bathroom / kitchen and pod screens.'
'Two layers 19mm curved toughened glass / supported onto 4 no. stainless steel feet / with curved upper surface fixed into / sockets in mezzanine'
'Curved 20mm diam brushed stainless / steel handrails with hinged connections to / supports. Handrails to rise and fall with / opening rooflight'
'POD 3   POD 2   POD 1'
'MOVEABLE STORAGE PODS'
'DIRECTION OF TRAVEL'
'3375   2795'
'Natural anodised individually pivoting and / sliding top hung aluminium screens. Doors / pivot individually in closed position, or / can slide and pivot to end stacking / positions.'
'New wall formed around existing column / using fully boxed studs faced with two / layers 12.5mm plasterboard'
'All light switches to be vertical line of / single toggle switched on rectangular SS / backplate'
'6 No Pixel framing projector light flush / fitting with plasterboard skin to ceiling. / (cat No 8075)'
'DIRECTION OF TRAVEL'
'huttle framing projector by Iguzzini / (ref: 8475, 75w 12v) mounted onto / track i recessed return between boxed / out beam and base of curved ceiling. / Tracks in 4no. structural bays only. Not / in entrance corridor and not above / storage pods. One additional projector / fixed between bathroom end column and existing end wall glazing'

fields.location: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level D

fields.name: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level D

fields.history_note: Original working drawings and designs for Chris Lowe loft apartment, Sumners Street, London, EC1 designed by architects Brookes Stacey Randell.
